original_text: In the first year of Belshazzar king of Babylon, Daniel had a dream, and visions passed through his mind as he was lying in bed. He wrote down the substance of his dream.
korean_text: 바벨론 벨사살 왕 원년에 다니엘이 그의 침상에서 꿈을 꾸며 머리 속으로 환상을 받고 그 꿈을 기록하며 그 일의 대략을 진술하니라

sentences.original_text: In the first year of Belshazzar king of Babylon,
and visions passed through his mind
as he was lying in bed.
He wrote down the substance of his dream.
